## Microclimatic point estimates


#### Data
```{r}
#library(climate)
library(hydroTSM)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
data <- read_csv("data/data.csv") %>%
  mutate(cd = mdy(date)) %>% 
  mutate(yd = yday(cd))

mz <- data %>% 
  filter(researcher == "mz")

ng <- data %>% 
  filter(researcher == "ng")

data_open <- data %>% 
  filter(microsite != c("high", "shrub"))

```


#### Viz
```{r}
#all data
ggplot(data) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, temperature, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

ggplot(data) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, humidity, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

#density only
ggplot(mz) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, temperature, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

ggplot(mz) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, humidity, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

#shelter-expt
ggplot(ng) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, temperature, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

ggplot(ng) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, humidity, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

#shelters + open
ggplot(data_open) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, temperature, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

ggplot(data_open) +
  geom_line(aes(yd, humidity, color = microsite), size = 2) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")



```
